review: I think it is better than Google stick. Except that this one just stops and needs to be restarted often.
author: L. Wechsler "shveckle"

review: Works great, very compact, very discrete and easy to install.  Have HBO go and Amazon prime setup, but also comes with the NFL network, and tons of other apps.  It's easy to use and the remote is very responsive, my in-laws have the Fire TV box with the voice input, but it's a feature that isn't too useful.

review: When something is too good to be true, it usually is. The stick worked for a few days and then quit. Refused to work on my 51in Samsung and 24in Insignia.

review: Best streaming device for the price! Better than Chromecast!

review: I have this, the Google Chromecast, and a Roku. The Fire TV Stick doesn't play Google Play content. The Chromecast doesn't play Amazon content. The Roku does both, plus Netflix, HBO Go, Hulu, and so much more.

review: I enjoy my Fire TV Stick.... I wish there was a way to "turn it off". Right now I just hit the home button and just turn my TV off.. Set up is very easy and I love how I can download the app to turn my cell phone into a remote...this comes in handy when I misplace the small remote that comes with the fire stick. No complaints.
